p: As depicted in Figure 4. A, an increase in the uterus weight was evident in the OVX + estradiol and OVX + Linum groups in comparison with the OVX ( p < .001). Also, statistical analysis did not show any significant difference between the uterus weight of positive control and the treated group. Similarly, the uterus volume of OVX + Linum group also demonstrated an increase compared with the OVX group ( p = .037).
